titles.title: For such a time like this

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 v3 c1 v4 c1 v4

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: In the ancient days of Persia,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: in the palace of the king lived a Jewish maid named Esther

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines: Who would rise to be the Queen,

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines: With a meek and quiet spirit she found favor in God’s sight,

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines: And the God she loved exalted her by His grace and might.

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
For such a time as this
our God has made us strong,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
and now we lift His banner high.
We must battle sin and wrong,

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
We will stand for truth and right.
We will boldly face each task,

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines:
Our God has blessed and raised us up,
For such a time as this.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Wicked Haman hated Mordecai,
So He sought to kill the Jews.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: And it looked like He would prosper till Queen Esther heard the news.

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines: Then she cried to God for mercy and she went before the king.

verse.name: v2d
verse.lines: Esther pleaded for Her people’s lives risking everything.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Still today the Lord is searching,
for some Heroes of the faith.

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Who will stand with strength and courage,
in a war that must be waged.

verse.name: v3c
verse.lines:
Ev’ry blessings we’ve been given,
has a price we’re called to pay.

verse.name: v3d
verse.lines:
God desires a living sacrifice,
pledge your life today.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines: And now we lift His banner high.

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines: We must battle sin and wrong,

verse.name: v4c
verse.lines:
Our God has blessed and raised us up,
for such a time as this.

verse.name: v4d
verse.lines: For such a time as this!
